strategy: Steel Legion armies have a Strategy Rating of 2.
Initiative: Titan Legion and Tempestus Scion formations have an Initiative Rating of 1+. All other formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Armageddon Steel Legion Regiment

formations.name: Regimental HQ
formations.units: One Steel Legion Supreme Commander with a Commissar, nine Infantry and five Chimeras

formations.name: Mechanized Infantry Company
formations.units: One Steel Legion Commander with a Commissar, nine Infantry and five Chimeras

formations.name: Infantry Company
formations.units: One Steel Legion Commander with a Commissar and twelve Infantry

formations.name: Leman Russ Company
formations.units: One Leman Russ Vanquisher with a Commissar, nine Leman Russ
extraUnits: Flak, Griffon Battery, Hellhound Squadron, Leman Russ Squadron

formations.name: Super-Heavy Tank Company
formations.units: Three Baneblades and/or Shadowswords, one with a Commissar
extraUnits: Ogryns, Flak, Leman Russ Squadron, Hellhounds

formations.name: Artillery Company
formations.units: Six Basilisks, one with a Commissar. Six Gun Emplacements.
extraUnits: Replace six Basilisks with Manticores: 50 points

sections.name: Support Formations
sections.description: Up to two Support Formations for each Company.

formations.name: Mechanized Infantry Platoon
extraUnits: Add up to three Hellhounds: 25 points each

formations.name: Artillery Battery
extraUnits: Replace three Basilisks with Manticores: 25 points

formations.name: Super-Heavy Tank Platoon
extraUnits: Replace one Baneblade or Stormblade with a Shadowsword: 25 points

formations.name: Leman Russ Platoon
formations.units: Six Leman Russ Punishers, Leman Russ Demolishers or Leman Russ Conquerors

formations.name: Tempestus Scion Company
formations.units: Seven Tempestus Scions and one Tempestor with a Commissar
extraUnits: Add four Taurox or four Valkyries: 150 points

sections.name: Titan Legion and Imperial Navy Formations
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on Titan Legion and Imperial Navy Formations

formations.name: Warhound Pack
extraUnits: Warhound Pack gains the 'Independent' special rule (see special rules) for 50 points.

formations.name: 0–1 Orbital Support
extraUnits: Replace with an Emperor Class Battleship for +50 points

upgrades.title: Steel Legion Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation. No more than three upgrades per Company

options.description: Add two or four Fire Support Squads
options.points: 50 points for two, 100 points for four

options.description: Add one Hydra. If added to an Artillery Company, also add a Gun Emplacement
Add three Leman Russ Punishers, Leman Russ Demolishers or Leman Russ Conquerors
Replace the Regimental HQ Commissar with a Lord Commissar.
* These upgrades may add Chimeras. If the formation contains Chimeras, then all INF in the formation must be transported in Chimeras.
